com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.util
Class CreateProject

java.lang.Object
  WorkspaceModifyOperation
      com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.util.CreateProject

public class CreateProject
extends WorkspaceModifyOperation

This class is called by the doFinish() method of the Wizard. It creates the Language Project and the necessary files etc with the help of the classes SourceCodeFactory and WizardProjectHelper.

createProject

private IProject createProject(IProgressMonitor monitor)
This class does all the needed steps to set the variables for the WizardProjectHelper and the calling of it's methods. Afterwords all other furcas specific files are built.

Parameters:
monitor - The progress monitor for the process of file creation
Returns:
The generated project.
